title: DRDO Recruitment 2017 Scientist B (23 Vacancies)
text:
Apply Online >> 
Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO), Recruitment & Assessment Centre (RAC) invites Online Recruitment Applications for direct recruitment of Scientist 'B' in DRDO and Scientist / Engineer 'B' in Aeronautical Development Agency (ADA) for filling up 233 Vacancies. The Online Registration start from 20th July 2016 and close on 10th August 2016. The candidates who have already registered for Advt No.120 published in Employment News Paper 05-11 March 2016 and applied successfully need not register / apply again. 
ADVERTISEMENT NO.120 
A: Part I - Screening Based on Valid GATE 2015/ 2016 Score: Subjects / Disciplines Essential Qualifications (from a recognized University or equivalent) Electronics & Communication Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Electronics & Communication Engg. Mechanical Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Mechanical Engg. Computer Science and Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Computer Science & Engg. Mathematics At least First Class Master's Degree in Mathematics. Electrical Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Electrical Engg. Physics At least First Class Master's Degree in Physics. Aeronautical Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Aeronautical Engg. Chemical Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Chemical Engg. Chemistry At least First Class Master's Degree in Chemistry. Textile Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Textile Engg. Civil Engineering At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Civil Engg.. Material Science & Engineering / Metallurgical Engineering 01 At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Metallurgy (Material Science & Engg/ Metallurgical Engg). 
Part II - Screening Based on Percentage of Marks in Essential Qualification: Subjects / Disciplines Essential Qualifications (from a recognized University or equivalent) Agriculture Science At least First Class Master's Degree in Agriculture Science from a recognized University or equivalent. Animal Science At least First Class Master's Degree in Animal Science from a recognized University or equivalent. Cognitive Science At least First Class Master's Degree in Cognitive Science from a recognized University or equivalent. Biomedical Engg 01 At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Biomedical Engg from a recognized university or equivalent. Fire Tech Safety Engg 05 At least First Class Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Technology in Fire Tech Safety Engg from a recognized university or equivalent. 
Age Limit : Not exceeding 28 Years as on closing date. Age Relaxation 05 years for SC / ST , 03 Years for OBC (NCL), For others as per Govt. Rules. 
Pay Scale : PB-3 ₹ 15600 - 39100 + Grade Pay ₹ 5400/- (Total Emoluments at the time of joining will be approximately ₹ 60,000/- Per Month 
Selection Process: The shortlisted candidates will be required to appear in the personal interview to be held at Delhi/ Bangalore/ Hyderabad/ Pune or any other place as decided by RAC / DRDO from July / August / September 2016 onwards tentatively. 
How to Apply : Eligible Indian National Candidates required to submit their applications online application through RAC Online Registration site from 20/07/2016 (17:00 hrs IST) to 10/08/2016 up to 17:00 hrs IST only. 
Important dates: 
Opening date for Online Registration -> 20/07/2016 at 10:00 Hours Last date for Online Registration -> 10/08/2016 at 17:00 Hours IST Finalization of shortlisted candidates -> Last week of June / First week of July 2016 Personal Interviews -> July / August 2016 onwards Finalization of shortlisted candidates (For PWDs) -> Last week of August 2016 Personal Interviews (For PWDs) -> September 2016 onwards
